SharedVision.VisionConf.Title: Vision Config
SharedVision.VisionConf.Global.Note: Configure whether this actor should share its vision with all users when the 'Enable Shared Vision' control button is enabled.
SharedVision.VisionConf.Global.Label: Global Shared Vision
SharedVision.VisionConf.Hidden.Note: Share vision if the token is hidden/invisible.
SharedVision.VisionConf.Hidden.Label: Share Hidden
SharedVision.VisionConf.User.Label: User Settings
SharedVision.VisionConf.User.Note: Configure whether this actor should always share its vision, location or fog of war reveal with specific users. 'Token' and 'Fog' are automatically enabled when 'Vision' is enabled
SharedVision.Conf.Title: Configuration
SharedVision.Conf.Note: Configure whether tokens with specific ownership or disposition should share their vision, location or fog of war reveal with specific users. 'Token' and 'Fog' are automatically enabled when 'Vision' is enabled
SharedVision.Conf.PermDisp.Label: Ownership & Disposition
SharedVision.Conf.Permission.Label: Ownership
SharedVision.Conf.Disposition.Label: Disposition
SharedVision.Conf.Combat.Label: Combat
SharedVision.Conf.Combat.Note: Configure how Shared Vision should be configured when combat starts and ends. These settings can always be overridden by the control buttons
SharedVision.Conf.CombatStart.Label: Start
SharedVision.Conf.CombatEnd.Label: End
